mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: The Coliseum Skate Foundation provides skateboarding programs, equipment, and opportunities to underserved youth communities.

programs.title: Youth Skateboarding Program
programs.description: Free skateboarding lessons and mentorship for youth ages 8-18.

programs.title: Board Donation Program
programs.description: Providing skateboards and safety equipment to kids who need them.

programs.title: Community Skatepark Initiative
programs.description: Working with communities to build and maintain skateparks.

events.title: Community Skate Day
events.description: Free community event with demos, lessons, and giveaways.

events.title: Annual Fundraiser
events.description: Annual fundraising event to support our youth programs.

events.title: Skate Clinic Series
events.description: Free weekly skateboarding clinics for all skill levels.
